question.title: Collecting distinct field value from an object in Java stream
question.body:
I am trying to collect distinct values of the one of the field in the object. I was hoping to use distinct() over stream however it can't be applied on field level. I have used Map to get the list mapped to object. Is there a way to get list of field only?

I have Employee object with ManagerId and I would like to collect distinct ManagerId list.

My Map Solution

Map<Long, Employee> employeeMap =employees.stream()
     .collect(Collectors.toMap(Employee::getManagerId, Function.identity(), (o, n) -> n);

I am looking to get List<Long> managerIds = .....
